New Records: The Bulls tied their franchise record on Monday night as they knocked down 25 threes.
Key Match Events: The Bulls came back from a 20-point deficit to win the game
The bench was huge in the middle of the third quarter, taking care of the basketball, generating good shots, and responding and reacting a lot better in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: Billy Donovan was especially impressed with the bench, mentioning that Jalen Smith, Julian Phillips, Lonzo Ball, and Ayo Dosunmu all had good games off the bench
Lonzo Ball mentioned that the team's three-point shooting has been good all year, and that they've got a lot of guards who can break down teams
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls will be back in action on Wednesday night at home as the Orlando Magic will be coming to town
This first month of the season is crucial, and if Chicago can get a win streak going, it would be huge
